head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths O'HARE, GERARD A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths O'HARE, GERARD A.

block.p: O'HARE-Gerard A. Of Baldwin on September 22nd, 2002, after a valiant battle with cancer. Beloved husband of Annette P. Cherished father of Michele Novelli (Dominic), Amy Potter (Van), Timothy (Nancy), and Alicia and Megan O'Hare. Dear brother of Marie O'Hare Scesney and Rev. Joseph A. O'Hare, S.J. Adored grandfather of Devon, Rhiannon and Aidan. Reposing at Fullerton Funeral Home, 769 Merrick Rd, Baldwin. Mass of Christian Burial St. Christopher's Church, Thursday 10:30 AM. Visiting Tuesday 7-9PM and Wednesday 2-4 & 7-9 PM. Donations to Good Shepherd Hospice, 578 Mineola Avenue, Carle Place, New York 11514, would be appreciated.
